text: Thattakam is a 1998 Indian Malayalam film directed by Ramesh Das and starring Nedumudi Venu and Ranjitha in the lead roles.http://spicyonion.com/title/thattakam-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Kaithapram * Nedumudi Venu * Jojan * KPAC Premachandran * Machan Varghese * Mala Aravindan * Pramesh * Ranjitha * Risabava * Sreehari * Sudha * Sunu * Vishnuprakash ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Thattakam
